ctaModal.editDescription: Customize your call-to-action header, description, button text, and link.
ctaModal.visibilityHelp: Toggle to show or hide this CTA section in generated reports.
ctaModal.buttonLinkHelp: Enter a full URL (https://...) or leave empty for no link.
